Title: Stand by Gene
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Jon Schroeder, Mike Benner (story editor)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: When Gene overhears talk about a mystical creature that lives nearby, he leads the Belcher kids and their friends on a journey to find it. Meanwhile, Linda's competitive nature takes over during downtime at the restaurant.
